item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 7, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. WebP: The WebPage Compression Format (240 points | 94 comments)
2. A new rare high-rank elliptic curve, and an orchard of Diophantine equations (105 points | 8 comments)
3. Cracking an old ZIP file to help open source the ANC's "Vula" secret crypto code (22 points | discuss)
4. Tire-related chemical responsible for salmon deaths in urban streams (2020) (50 points | 6 comments)
5. Dogs can remember names of toys years after not seeing them, study shows (143 points | 67 comments)
6. Things to know about the Great Wave (151 points | 38 comments)
7. Hallelujah, Leonard Cohen, and a Pulitzer Prize-winning writer's suicide (66 points | 29 comments)
8. Keyhole – Forge own Windows Store licenses (455 points | 221 comments)
9. The "email is authentication" pattern (62 points | 79 comments)
10. CitizenDJ – Make music using free audio and video from the Library of Congress (23 points | 3 comments)
11. Nonstandard Analysis (1972) (11 points | 3 comments)
12. My new rust binary search (34 points | 33 comments)
13. Alternatives to Google Products – Updated (15 points | 9 comments)
14. The PERQ Computer (141 points | 76 comments)

16. Groups underpin modern math (7 points | 8 comments)
17. Substack (YC W18) Is Hiring Machine Learning Engineers ( | hide)

19. How to wrap a C compiler and preprocessor, really (3 points | discuss)
20. Memorizing the first 100 perfect squares (2022) (3 points | discuss)
21. Conservative GC can be faster than precise GC (117 points | 67 comments)
22. Google says replacing C/C++ in firmware with Rust is easy (10 points | 1 comment)
23. A Post-Google World? (134 points | 81 comments)
24. Against Rereading (5 points | discuss)
25. Simon Verity believed in working the medieval way (5 points | 1 comment)
26. SQLToy (3 points | 1 comment)
27. Four Thieves Vinegar Collective – Harm Reduction for the Living (146 points | 118 comments)
28. The Beginnings of FM Radio Broadcasting (2018) (93 points | 15 comments)
29. Dance Choreography Notation (2017) (97 points | 20 comments)
30. Adding algebraic data types to Nickel (25 points | 8 comments)
